pkgmetadata.longdescription: Datasets with Strong and Spurious Correlations // Provides datasets from Vigen (2015) https://web.archive.org/web/20230607 181247/https%3A/tylervigen.com/spurious-correlations rescued from the Internet Wayback Machine. These should be preserved for statistics introductory courses as these make it very clear that correlation is not causation.
